description.displayText:
I am a mom of two and for the last two years Camille N. has been taking
care of my kids, both under the age of 3.5, on and off while I freelance and go on
job interviews, etc. 
My children love Camille. They naturally gravitate towards her and they know that when she comes to care for them, it is going to be a day full of fun and activities for them. 

I love how Camille cares for my kids for the following reasons:
* My kids love her
* She preps healthy snacks for my kids.
* Takes them to the public library for story-telling 
* Takes them to every single park around my neighborhood
* When my kids are sick, she follows all my medication instructions perfectly!
* She is fun and very energetic
* She genuinely loves kids
* When my kids misbehave, she talks to them- no screaming, yelling, losing
temper etc...
* She has a great personality and always welcomes any feedback from my
partner or me.
* Keeps me up to date of whatever activities she has decided to do with the kids.
* She bathes my kids to prep them to sleep if I'm running late
* I trust Camille 100 percent with my kids. My kids are a handful, especially my
boy and she manages very well with both of them. 

These are some of the reasons why I like having Camille as my sitter whenever I
need the help.

Lastly, Camille continues to care for my children 8 & 10 years old on some occasions when NYC Schools are closed. My kids simply adore her.

description.displayText: We interviewed Camille to take care of our 4 year old daughter.  She was a very warm yet reserved personality and she got along great with our daughter.  She is very articulate and seemed very honest, trustworthy and appeared to be very dedicated and committed to children.  She is motivated and has taken several child education courses and classes. We strongly considered hiring her and I do think she would be a good nanny for us.  We hope she finds a loving family to work with.  She would be a great addition.
